tools.name: get_synapse_restriction_info
tools.description: Retrieve restriction information for a Synapse entity. Returns details about access requirements, restriction level (OPEN, RESTRICTED_BY_TERMS_OF_USE, CONTROLLED_BY_ACT), and restriction details including requirement IDs and types.

tools.name: get_synapse_acl
tools.description: Retrieve ACL (Access Control List) information for a Synapse access requirement. Returns details about who manages the access requirement, including principal IDs and their permissions.

requirement_id.description: The access requirement ID from restriction information
